trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee could use some assistance in granting the heart's desire of a young Mord.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_TODO_00<tab>Slay an anemone north of Lydha Lran and obtain a wriggling tendril.
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the wriggling tendril to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_000<tab>So, I was playing in a Mordling's dream the other day─yes, yes, hello to you, too─and he starts talking about wanting to eat a “whole bucketful of wrigglers”! And I said I could make that happen, helpful Dreamspinner that I am, though I had absolutely no idea what he was on about...

TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Well, as it turns out, wrigglers─an <var 1A 02 /var>extraordinarily<var 1A 01 /var> weird sort of worm, apparently─aren't easy to come by in Il Mheg. By which I mean that we don't have any at all, let alone a bucket's worth!
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Not to worry, though! If I just work a little bit of magic on something sufficiently wiggly, it should come to the same thing. Approximately. Probably.
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_003<tab>Either way, we won't know until we try! Which is why I need you to fetch me the wiggly bit of an anemone. The sooner the better, favorite mortal of mine!
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_010<tab>By the undulating of that sack, I take it you've snagged what we need!
TEXT_BANPIX121_03709_UINNEE_000_012<tab>With a few minor adjustments, I should have no trouble making this into a dream-wriggler. None at all! Now, where did I put that phlegm I've been saving...
